data.meta_site_name: The Town of Derry, Maine Wiki
data.text:
It is an American psychological horror drama television series, based on Stephen King's 1986 novel of the same name. The series involves a first and second seasons, the first focusing on the 1957-1958 killing spree of Pennywise, an ancient evil being who awakens every 27 years to feed on the residents of Derry, Maine.

Like the 1990 miniseries, the series will take place during the years the book is set in, 1957-58 and 1984-85 respectively, however, the more explicit violence in the book will be included.

Synopsis[]

In 1957, a group of social outcasts band together in order to face an ancient demonic clown only known as It. However 27 years later, these outcasts must unite again as adults in order to defeat It once and for all.
